title: UX Designer
description:
DesignFlow Studio is Hiring a UX Designer (Full-Time)

DesignFlow Studio, a Toronto-based design agency, creates user-centric digital experiences for clients in tech, education, and healthcare. We’re seeking a talented UX Designer to craft intuitive interfaces.

Role Summary
You’ll design user experiences that delight users, working with product teams and clients to shape digital products from concept to launch.

Key Responsibilities
- Create wireframes and prototypes using Figma.
- Conduct user research to understand needs.
- Design responsive interfaces for web and mobile.
- Collaborate with developers for design fidelity.
- Perform usability testing to refine designs.
- Develop style guides.
- Optimize for accessibility.
- Stay updated on UX trends.
- Present design concepts to stakeholders.
- Support product development.

What We Need
Candidates should have 3–5 years of experience in UX design, proficient in Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch. Strong user research and usability testing skills are essential, along with accessibility knowledge. Excellent collaboration and communication are required. A Bachelor’s degree in design, HCI, or a related field is necessary.

Why DesignFlow?
We’re a creative team that values innovation. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility. We support growth with workshops and design tools. You’ll work on diverse projects in a supportive environment.

Perks
Health, dental, and vision insurance
RRSP matching
20 days of annual leave
Design software access
Professional development budget
Team-building events

Join Us
Apply now to create user-focused designs with DesignFlow Studio!
